name: still-good-mern-graphql

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m Heroku && git push && git push heroku && heroku logs --tail --remote heroku

author: Victor Weinert, TJ James, Lauren Groh, Melvin Welton, Patrick Sebstead, Alex McDaniel
